head.title: COVID-19 Info - Fort Hancock Independent School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h1:
Fort Hancock Independent School District
Success for All

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Fort Hancock Independent School District » COVID-19 Info

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: Fort Hancock ISD will join other school districts throughout the state in remaining closed until at least Monday, May 4, as part of Texas Governor Greg Abbott’s extended executive order he signed this afternoon in an effort to continue to limit the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19).

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: Please know that throughout the course of our closing, curbside meal pickups will still be offered each weekday, remote learning will continue to take place on the school’s website, and school auxiliary staff will continue to thoroughly disinfect our campuses and facilities.

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has outlined the need for all communities to implement a social distancing protocol.

span.style: color: black; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.span: Again, Fort Hancock ISD schools will remain closed until at least Monday, May 4. For the most up-to-date information, please continue to follow us on our district website at www.fhisd.net as well as our Facebook page.

span.style: color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;
color: black; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

h4.img: Welcome to the Fort Hancock Independent School District Coronavirus Information Site, a dedicated space on our district website designed to keep parents, staff, and the entire community informed about the potential effect of the Coronavirus.

span.span: This New Site serves as an ongoing reliable resource for the entire school community, demonstrating proactive and transparent access to critical information. We will continue to update this with news and information as it becomes available. It is our mission to keep you informed on how we are preparing to cope with Coronavirus and any other potential health-related or time-critical topics. We hope you'll find it useful.

a.title: Click here to view March 19th update
Click her to view March 13th update

h3.span: Currently, the key recommendations from public health agencies to prevent the spread of respiratory viruses are as follows:

li.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;
li.span: Wash hands often with soap and water for 20 seconds, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer

li.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;
li.span: Avoid touching eyes, nose, and mouth

li.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;
li.span: Avoid close contact with people who are sick

li.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;
margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;
li.span: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces

li.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;

p.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;

span.span: In addition, we strongly urge students to stay home if they show any signs of respiratory illness or flu-like symptoms.

h3.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 10px 0px 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lora, serif; font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal;

a.span: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (Coronavirus)
Texas Department of State Health Services (Coronavirus)
El Paso Department of Public Health (Coronavirus)
